attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: “The Liberation Tigers of Tamil Eelam (LTTE), are arguably the most lethal and well organised terrorist group in the world, they began its armed campaign in Sri Lanka for a separate Tamil homeland in 1983. Under the Prevention of Terrorism Act, 2002 (POTA) in India, the LTTE is a proscribed organisation. On October 4, 2003, the United States re-designated the LTTE as a Foreign Terrorist Organisation (FTO) pursuant to Section 219 of the US Immigration and Nationality Act.”   The LTTE has been proscribed, designated or banned as a terrorist group by a number of governments - India, Malaysia, USA, Canada, UK, Australia - countries where the LTTE has significant terrorist infrastructure for disseminating propaganda, raising funds, procuring and shipping supplies to support their terrorist campaign in Sri Lanka.”    The Ceylonese Peace Alliance is a Democratic Centre Left Peace alliance established in UK  community  ardently campaigning to uphold THE Rule of Law.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
